name: Wintaplas Smart adhesives Orange Frostproofer, 5L Plastic jerry can
description: Bostik Frostproofer & Accelerator accelerates the setting of mortar mixes year round but particularly in cold weather and during the winter months. It also plasticises the mix to improve workability and is ideal for bricklaying, rendering, blockwork and mortars containing embedded metal. Chloride free, ideal for mortars with embedded metal. Plasticises and accelerates setting time of mortar mixes.

name: Sika Latex SBR White Specialist building primer, 5L, 5.2kg
description: Uses include: As an admixture for mortar/screeds/renders, as a bonding agent for screeds/renders, as a primer/sealer in tiling applications & as a flexibiliser for cementitious-based tile adhesive when tiling on wooden/asphalt floors. This latex-based, water resistant bonding agent & admixture from Sika is suitable for use in areas which will be subject to high levels of humidity, dampness and continuous water contact. Improves water resistance of cement mixtures by forming a reinforcing polymer that increases long term durability and flexibility of the mix on renderings and floor screeds. Excellent resistance to water and water vapourA high level of resistance to salt permeation.

name: Blue Circle Hydrated lime, 25kg Bag
description: Hydralime can be used for traditional nominal mixes for mortars and renders in conjunction with standard Portland based cements or in lime-washes without cement. Fine, white, dry powder which lightens and brightens mortarsA high calcium, non hydraulic, hydrated lime. Preparation: 1 part Portland cement, 1 part hydralime & 5 to 6 parts sand. Blue Circle Hydralime is a hydrated lime used for increased plasticity & cohesiveness in cement, mortars & renders.

name: Sika Clear Masonry waterproofer, 5L Jerry can
description: Sikagard Facade makes walls and facades water repellent and provides long lasting protection against water ingress. Improves resistance to dirt pick up, and reduces fungal, algal and lichens growth. Can be applied on mortar, masonry, fibre-cement & stone. It is vapour permeable and allows the substrate to breathe.

name: Sika Sikacem White PVA primer & sealer 5L
description: Cem® PVA is a water based, multi purpose, economic adhesive, sealer and mortar admixture. It adheres to most common building materials (except PVC and rubber). Improves flexibility of mortars and screeds. Easy to use.

name: Bostik Smart adhesives Dark brown Mortar plasticiser, 5L Plastic jerry can
description: It helps reduce grittiness to provide a smooth mortar with improved durability and protection against frost. Bostik Mortar Plasticiser improves the workability of mortar without the addition of lime. It also reduces the water content of the mortar. Improves workability and durability of mortar.

name: Bostik Frostproofer, 1L Jerry can
description: Accelerates setting times in cold conditions, making it particularly effective at improving the workability concrete and mortar. Chloride-free.

name: Sandtex Stabilising solution, 2.5L Tub

name: Wood's Milan 9000BTU Air conditioner
description: This air conditioner will quickly and efficiently regulate the temperature in your home or work place, providing a comfortable climate all year around. Digital touch control panel as well as a remote control that makes it very easy to use. The Wood’s Milan 9K is a powerful air conditioner with a sleek and elegant design. Sturdy wheels making the unit easy to move around the home.

name: GoodHome Air conditioning door & window seal
description: Easy to install and suitable for all air conditioning units, this window seal kit is ideal for upgrading the air conditioners performance. The elastic opening is able to easily receive a hot air outlet with a diameter of 100mm to 200mm. Useful for increasing cooling performance and reducing energy consumption. It reduces the return flow of warm air, so that your mobile air conditioning unit can be more efficient and cools your room in less time.

name: Yale Premium Plus Intruder alarm kit
description: The Yale Premium Alarm Set includes 2x motion detectors, 2x door/window opening sensors, 1x control panel and 1x outdoor siren. Comes with 2x motion detectors, 2x door/window contacts, control panel, external siren, batteries and fixing pack. The part arm feature means you can choose which zone of your home needs to be controlled by the system, offering security to your home even when you're in. The different components are already pre-linked which means it's easier and quicker set up.

name: Yale HSA Wireless Door & window Intruder alarm contact
description: Compatible with All Yale security alarms less than 4 years old. Features and benefits30m wireless range. Zone control panel. Battery-powered.

name: Yale IA-320 Sync Smart 6 piece Intruder alarm kit
description: The Yale Sync Smart Home Alarm is BSI IOT Kitemarked; having undergone rigorous testing including quality, durability and physical attack tests, this alarm is secure against advanced hacking methods. Integrate your Sync Alarm with other Yale security products, including Cameras and Smart Lock* in one place with the Yale Home AppE.g. Bringing you a new level of security with the ability to integrate with lights and voice assistants to enhance your security system. Choose whether to fully secure or part arm your system for total security, making it easy to feel secure at night or when leaving pets at home.

name: Yale Essentials Intruder alarm kit
description: Easy, wire-free set up for quick and easy installation. Battery powered and wire-free for easy installation. Fully expandable system with up to 3 accessories/zones. The Essentials Alarm keeps your home secure without any monitoring fees.

name: Ring 2nd Gen Smart 5 piece Starter alarm kit
description: Optional cellular backup allowing you to continue monitoring your home in the event that your system goes offline. Comes with- Base Station, Keypad, Contact Sensor, Motion Detector, Range Extender. Real-time notifications sent when any of your alarm sensors are triggered24-hour backup battery keeping your home safe and secure even if the power goes out. With a new look and the same great protection, Alarm Security 5 Piece Kit is an ideal way to get started in whole-home protection for your house or flat.

name: Yale Shed & garage alarm kit
description: Fully expandable using touch and link technology. Wall mounted or free standing. Easy and wire-free installation. Motion detector alarm.

name: Yale Intruder alarm key fob, Pack of 2
description: Compatible with the Premium Plus HSA6410. No need to share pin codes. Compatible with HSA range.

name: Yale Flashing dummy siren
description: This Dummy Siren is NOT linked to an alarm system and only designed as a visual deterrent, it does NOT sound or trigger. "This Yale Dummy Siren with flashing LED is ideal for creating the appearance of an alarm system and improving your home security. Ds to replicate a live siren. Battery Life - 3 years.

name: Smartwares Glass Break Wireless Intruder alarm sensor, Pack of 2
description: Scare off burglars with glass break sensor alarmsA loud alarm of 90 dB will be triggered when the sensor detects vibrations or if the windows breaks. The set contains two sensors that will sound an alarm when a burglar tries to enter your home by smashing a window. Secure your home with the Smartwares Glass Break Sensor Alarm. Easy to use with a switch on the side to turn on and off.

name: Smartwares Mini alarm Wireless Intruder alarm sensor, Pack of 2
description: Ideal for doors and windows but also can be used for for smaller objects such as medicine cabinetsA sound pressure level of 90dB will be triggered when the sensor detects vibrations or if the windows breaks. It is also possible to use the alarm to secure a cabinet where you store your medicine or detergents. Switch the alarm easily on and off by using the switch on the side of the alarm unit. Intruders will be deterred when they attempt to break into a secured areas and hear the loud 85 dB alarm.

name: Yale Wireless Intruder alarm motion sensor
description: When the alarm is set, the infrared sensor will pick up movement and activate the siren. Suitable for garages and outbuildings90° detection range. Fittings & fixings included. Compatible with HSA range.

name: Yale IA Wireless Door Contact sensor
description: The Yale Door/Window Contact is easy to link with your Yale Sync Smart Home Alarm allowing you to customise your system with up to 40 accessories, with no need to use screws, perfect if you are renting your home. Smarter together, the Yale Sync Alarm works with Philips Hue and Amazon Alexa, combining lights, sound and voice to create the ultimate security deterrent. Our Smart Home alarms are easy to set up and fully controllable from our Yale Home App through your phone, tablet and Apple Watch as well. Link to your Yale Sync Smart Home Alarm straight out of the box, allowing you to customise your system with 40 accessories.

name: Yale Intruder alarm key fob
description: Compatible with Can be used with 54473 and 97114, and with any of the Series 6000 alarms. Features and benefits30m wireless range. Zone control panel. Battery-powered.

name: Yale IA AC-PIR Wireless Motion detector
description: Our Smart Home alarms are easy to set up and fully controllable from our Yale Home App through your phone, tablet and Apple Watch as well. The Yale Sync alarm also connects simply to other Yale smart security products insuring total peace of mind from anywhere. Link to your Yale Sync Smart Home Alarm straight out of the box, allowing you to customise your system with 40 accessories. Smarter together, the Yale Sync Alarm works with Philips Hue and Amazon Alexa, combining lights, sound and voice to create the ultimate security deterrent.

name: Smartwares Pincode Wireless Intruder alarm sensor, Pack of 1
description: You can mount the alarm to your door or window to get warned if burglars try to force your door or window to get inside. The Smartwares SMA-40252 Door/window alarm allows you to secure your door, window or even your cupboard. No complicated alarm system but a small simple alarm. Comes with Magnetic sensor with keypad & all batteries.

name: Yale AC-KF Alarm key fob
description: The Key Fob is easy to link with your Yale Sync Smart Home Alarm allowing you to customise your system with up to 40 accessories, with no need to use screws, perfect if you are renting your home. Link to your Yale Sync Smart Home Alarm straight out of the box, allowing you to customise your system with 40 accessories. Bringing you a new level of security with the ability to integrate with lights and voice assistants to enhance your security system. Our Smart Home alarms are easy to set up and fully controllable from our Yale Home App through your phone, tablet and Apple Watch as well.

name: Bosch Smart Home Wireless Door & window Alarm contact sensor
description: It can work alongside all other Bosch Smart Home products to reduce or stop heating when windows are opened and trigger an alarm in the event of unauthorised entry. Status display (open/closed) shows in App favourites. Detects and informs about open doors and windows. Notifies connected radiator thermostats about open windows.

name: Aico SmartLINK Interlinked Alarm module
description: The module plugs into the designated slot on the back of all Ei3000 series alarm heads. The Aico alarm module is an optional add-on for use with the Ei3000 series of alarms. Receives, transmits and repeats RF specific data. Allows wireless interconnection with up to 12 alarms and devices.

name: Ring 2nd Gen Alarm keypad
description: Compatible with 1st and 2nd generation Ring Alarm devices and accessories.3 available security modes: Home, Away & Disarmed. Featuring a more compact design to seamlessly blend into your home, Ring Alarm Keypad can be placed wherever is most convenient to easily arm and disarm your Alarm system. Compatible with 1st and 2nd generation Ring Alarm devices and accessories. All new panic buttons will sound the siren on your base station or outdoor siren and notify your emergency contacts.

name: Bosch Smart Home White Room control kit
description: Thanks to the intelligent interaction between the devices of the Bosch Smart Home Indoor Climate Starter Kit, you always enjoy your personal feel-good temperature at home, while saving energy at the same time. Comes with 1x Smart Home controller, 1x door/window contact & 2x radiator thermostats. Door/Window contact informs radiator thermostats about open windows. With a smart home, you save valuable time and money in the long term.

name: Bosch Smart Home Smart 4 piece Starter alarm kit
description: Comes with- 1x Smart Home controller, 1x door/window contact, 1x smoke detector & 1x motion detector. The combination of smart products detects smoke or unauthorized access and triggers an alarm siren. Ideal combination of Bosch Smart Home products for a home alarm system. Warning notifications are sent to the Bosch Smart Home App immediately.

name: Bosch Smart Home RFPR-ZB-SH-EU Wireless Motion detector
description: Automatic light control (via the app service "moving light“)Pet immunity for pets weighing up to 25kg. Secures your home with integration into Bosch Smart Home alarm system, sneak-by guard and demolition alarm. When at home, you can use the Motion Detector for automatic lighting control with Philips Hue or Ledvance lamps as well as Bosch Smart Plugs. Minimal maintenance - battery life of up to 5 years.

name: Bosch Smart Home Flood & water alarm
description: The Bosch Smart Home water alarm informs you in the event of a water leakage – visually (blue flashing of your Philips Hue or Ledvance lights), acoustically and via app - and helps you to prevent significant water damage. An app automation will immediately deactivate household devices connected to Bosch smart plugs to prevent further water spillage. The water alarm also activates your indoor camera to see live images while the emergency call button pops up in your Smart Home app. The flat, compact design makes it fit into corners and under many washing machines.

name: Ring Wireless Outdoor Siren
description: Outdoor Siren also supports Ring Plug-in Adapter (2nd Generation) which allows you to power the Dusk to Dawn feature from an internal electrical socket. To use the Dusk to Dawn feature you will need to power Outdoor Siren with a Quick Release Battery Pack combined with a Solar Panel for a continuous charge, or hardwired for non-stop power. Connect an additional compatible power source and turn on the Dusk to Dawn feature to use Ring Alarm Outdoor Siren as an everyday security sign. With Dusk to Dawn activated, your Outdoor Siren will be visible after dark and will let the neighbourhood know you have security covered.

name: Ryobi ONE+ 18V One+ 115mm Brushed Cordless Angle grinder R18AG-0 - Bare unit
description: This item is a 'bare' tool (without battery or charger) which is a great value way to expand your ONE+ collection. The tool includes an auxiliary handle, wrench, wheel guard and metal grinding disc. Discs can be easily changed using the tool-less wheel guard and nut. Comes with Auxiliary handle, wrench, wheel guard and 1x grinding disc.

name: Black+Decker 710W 230V 115mm Corded Angle grinder BEG010A5
description: Mains-powered angle grinder with a 3 m cable115 mm disc diameter-great for smaller everyday tasks. Lock on switch and 2 handle positions, you can feel at-ease completing any cutting or grinding project. Comes with 710W 115mm grinder, 4x metal cutting discs, 1x stone cutting disc, cutting guard, grinding guard. With even more control due to the soft start engine, that reduces movement of the tool on start up.

name: Mac Allister 750W 240V 115mm Corded Angle grinder 2525
description: Tool-free guard adjustment ensures quick and easy guard change. Supplied with grinding guard, cutting guard, 1 spanner and 1 side handle. Unique, ergomonic soft grip handle for comfort whilst working. Two position side handle provides increased user comfort and control.
